import {ChangeDetectionStrategy, Component, Input} from '@angular/core'; import {ISectionData} from "../interfaces/cv-interfaces"; @Component({ selector: 'app-section-view', templateUrl: './section-view.component.html', styleUrls: ['./section-view.component.css'] }) export class SectionViewComponent { @Input() public sectionData: ISectionData }
